name: Subnautical Nonsense
description:
Subnautical Nonsense is a 64x64 survival exploration game made for LOWREZJAM 2022.

Your boat has crashed in the middle of nowhere! You must find the other half of your ship and retrieve the radio to call for help! Venture down into the depths of the ocean, collect materials, and don't forget oxygen which can be restored at the surface or from bubble plants found underwater.

Controls:

• Move: WASD

• Inventory: Tab

• Change inventory page: Q & E

• Craft: Left click

• Pause: Escape

• Fullscreen:
    Windows: Alt + Enter
    Mac: Command + F

Objective:

Find the other half of your wrecked ship and locate the ship's radio to call for help. The radio should be in the cockpit of the boat and look like this.

Planned features:

• Enemies

• Lighting

• Larger map

• More detailed map

• More animations

• Settings and options

Created by Team Catshark. 

All sounds and assets were created by Team Catshark unless otherwise noted.

"Hit_03.wav" by LittleRobotSoundFactory on https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270332/
